it.unimi.dsi.webgraph.algo
Class NeighbourhoodFunction

java.lang.Object
  it.unimi.dsi.webgraph.algo.NeighbourhoodFunction

public class NeighbourhoodFunction
extends Object

Computes the neighbourhood function of a graph by multiple breadth-first visits.

Note that performing all breadth-first visits requires time O(nm), so this class is usable only on very small graphs.

Additionally, this class provides several useful static methods such as shortestPathsCumulativeDistributionFunction(double[]), effectiveDiameter(double, double[]) and spid(double[]) that act on neighbourhood functions.

Author:
Paolo Boldi, Sebastiano Vigna
